channel.title: Radio Africa Online Mixes
channel.itunes:subtitle: Hot Hot Hot Remixes
channel.itunes:author: dj.henri
channel.itunes:summary: Super remixes from dj.henri, spinmeister for Radio Africa Online (RAO - http://radioafricaonline.com), the longest-running station playing African and Caribbean music online. RAO is a Staff Favorite on iTunes Radio, an Editor's Pick on both Windows Media Radio and Live365, and featured on the top webradio networks worldwide. There are 4,700 tracks in RAO's incredibly diverse playlist, and 200,000 total listener hours are logged every year.
channel.description: dj.henri has picked the best tracks from his 5,100 track collection from The DR Congo, Cameroon, Haiti, Guadeloupe, Martinique, Nigeria, South Africa, Tanzania, Kenya, Ethiopia, Algeria, Iran, Morocco, Egypt, Lebanon, Cabo Verde, Cote d'Ivoire, Mali, Ghana, Barbados, Benin, Mozambique, Angola, Senegal, and Congo - Brazzaville, for these fantastic mixes

item.itunes:subtitle: Can you dig the upbeat reggae-inspired vibe coming from the streets of Accra, Ghana? Featuring Daddy Lumba, Ofori Amponsah, Batman, and more
